titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to increase authorization levels for the small business development center program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.subcommittee: SBA Legislation and the General Economy

bill.summary: 4/12/1994--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to increase, for each of FY 1994 through 1999, the authorization levels for the small business development center program.
